title: NOOOO fuck u %%%%s
body: I HAVE FUCKING SPENT 200$ OR MORE ON THIS GAME AND I GET FUCKING PERMA BANNED FUCKING GIVE ME MY MONEY BACK OR GIVE ME MY ACC BACK U FUCKING ASSHOLES FFS IM SO FUCKING PISSED U %%%%S
